explanation: [0-0] A view of some houses and trees in the distance. A burning sphere appears in the sky.

[0-5] A swirl appears around the sphere, and as the sphere descends, the swirl gradually expands. The sphere continues to descend, and the color of the swirl becomes brighter, gradually changing from blue to pink. The scene switches to a room where a man with a black mask, a green jacket, and silver-white hair is standing. His left eye glows red. He then covers his eyes with his left hand, and the subtitle "I don't have this much chakra" appears at the top of the screen. Then the scene switches to another part of the room, where a man in orange clothes is standing. There is a desk fan against the wall of the room. He extends his right index finger in front of him, looks straight ahead, then drops his arms naturally and says something. The subtitle "I will give you my Ki energy" appears at the top of the screen.

[5-12] Then the scene switches back to the silver-haired man with the mask, who is standing in front of a glass door, leaning slightly forward. The man in orange is standing behind him, extending his left hand, palm facing the silver-haired man's back. The man in orange transmits energy to the silver-haired man, the energy appearing as a golden glow. Then the picture switches back to the silver-haired man, he looks up, his left eye glows red, and then a pink glow erupts around him. Then the scene switches to a black background, a blue Earth appears in the center of the screen, and a red light spot appears on the Earth. The light spot gradually expands into a red swirl, then the picture gradually darkens, and the subtitle "Oops, a bit too much" appears for an extended time.
